'''2.3.522''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on December 5, 2022.

== Changes ==
* Various stability & under-the-hood improvements.

== Fixes ==
Fixes to some high impact issues some users ran into:
* {{bug|MCL-22768}} - Launcher deletes custom resolutions from JSON file
* {{bug|MCL-22665}} - Unable to play 1.8.9</onlyinclude>
